attributes.action: More pelvic floor and prolapse awareness in schools for young women
attributes.additional_details: Many Women suffer from different types of prolapses and it is more common than you think. Early awareness is critical so that young women know more about the pelvic floor and what to do to help prevent future problems. Knowledge of the different types of prolapse and how to prevent them would be fantastic for young women and get the word out there
attributes.background: Older girls at high school need to learn about the importance of the pelvic floor and the different prolapse conditions that can affect women after childbirth, and later in life. Early awareness is essential and would help lots of young women through more awareness

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about awareness of pelvic floor and prolapse, but we're not sure if you want the Government to fund a public awareness campaign in schools, or add content on this to the national curriculum.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund more support and awareness for pelvic floor prolapses in women: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570199
